channel.title: [317] Delta PROBLEM NEED HELP FAST [317]
channel.description:
Guys im trying to make something and im using this code for it "+Item.randomDice()+" but when in-game it wont say the name it will say the id of the item, does anyone know to make it say the name.
Here's what context its in.
sM("You win you got " +Item.randomDice()+ "");
Im doing a command ::test
E.X. if i do ::test
it will say: You win you got 12059.
i need the 12059 to be the name of the item.
Need help
Thanks :D
